docComment:
/**
 * sync-engine
 *
 * Sync AI assistant configurations between tools (Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Kiro, etc.)
 *
 * @packageDocumentation
 */
name: @mnorth/dotagent

description

members.docComment:
/**
 * Helper to create an agent-requested rule.
 *
 * @param name - Rule name
 *
 * @param content - Rule content
 *
 * @param description - Required description for AI to evaluate relevance
 *
 * @returns A Rule with agentRequested inclusion mode
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: createAgentRequestedRule

members.docComment:
/**
 * Helper to create an always-apply rule.
 *
 * @param name - Rule name
 *
 * @param content - Rule content
 *
 * @param description - Optional description
 *
 * @returns A Rule with always inclusion mode
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: createAlwaysRule

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a Command instance with validation.
 *
 * @param input - The command properties
 *
 * @returns A validated Command instance
 *
 * @throws
 *
 * Error if validation fails
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: createCommand

/**
 * Helper to create a file-match rule.
 *
 * @param name - Rule name
 *
 * @param content - Rule content
 *
 * @param patterns - Glob patterns for file matching
 *
 * @param description - Optional description
 *
 * @returns A Rule with fileMatch inclusion mode
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: createFileMatchRule

 * Error if the tool is not supported

 * Simplified validators - structural validation only
 *
 * This module provides basic validation for customization types. Validation focuses on required fields, not content heuristics.
